summary:
Kiran has 10 years of experience in software Quality assurance and engineering mainly in insurance, automotive and public sectors. He is a certified SCRUM coach, SCRUM master, Product Owner and certified in ISTQB (advanced level). He has worked with colleagues in the Agile Scrum teams for 5+ years and contributed extensively in CI/CD, test automation and test process implementation. Eventually, have helped the organization and clients to achieve their quality goals in their journey towards digital transformation.

As a Senior Agile Test Engineer, he knows how important a good safety net of testing is during development and knows how important automation is in the long term and in Agile environments. He validates the operation of User Stories within the Sprint and automates the tests he carries out wherever possible. He has extensive knowledge of the Test Strategy, Software Development Lifecycle, Test Lifecycle and Defect Lifecycle. He has worked in Agile Scrum – Nexus and SAFe framework and in test phases such as System Integration testing, User Acceptance Testing and Production support. He also has experience in Dev-Op's environment (Jira, Confluence, Jenkins, SonarQube, Selenium, GitHub). On the technical front, Kiran has good hands-on exposure in functional testing, DB testing (via SQL queries), Selenium - data driven and Robot framework, web services- soap UI, postman, (validation via XML responses), End-to-End / Chain testing, Risk-oriented testing,  Exploratory testing, Regression & Migration Testing. He worked with test management tools such as ALM, Microsoft Test Manager (TFS), JIRA, Confluence and Bug tracker.

As Technical Test Manager / Test Coordinator, Kiran is responsible for defining requirements analysis, test statistics, QA process & parameter, test strategy, responsible for QA deliverables and QA team building and reporting. He is also a trainer in concepts such as Agile, QA process and soft skills. As a Scrum master, He has also facilitated Agile mindset both 'agile-built in' and 'agile-transformational' projects. In his 10-year career, he has worked effectively for clients such as UWV insurance, ACE insurance, CHUBB insurance and Daimler. He also has good presentation and communication skills that allow him to work efficiently from an offshore position with various onshore customers and stakeholders from countries such as the US, Germany, Poland, Morocco, France, the United Kingdom and the Netherlands. He is a proactive, structured, empathetic serving team builder, serving team leader and team player.

awards.title: STAR Award
awards.description:
Dear Kiran,
Congratulations on winning the STAR (Special Thanks And Recognition) for the period 01 Dec 2018 to 31 Dec 2018!
You have received this award in appreciation of your dedication and efforts that have contributed to the success of our organization.
Capgemini counts on your continued participation and unstinted support, as we step forward towards higher goals.

profile_positions.description:
Roles and Responsibilities:


•	Analyzed User Requirements, specifications and develop test plans, test scenarios, gap analysis, test cases, test Scripts, test Results, for both positive and negative Scenarios and mapped the same to Requirements.
•	Performed Web service testing Importing WSDL / Service end point into Soap UI, building XML Soap request for a particular contract and execution of request using SOAP UI and Jmeter tools for further debugging of issues and validating the functionality in database using sql queries
•	Worked closely with the Business Analysts, Developers, and Database Architect in identifying the outstanding Issues in User Requirements and Specifications
•	Created and executed test scripts using selenium STAT automation tool using keyword driven framework
•	Automated user stories on web applications using selenium for Robot Framework 
•	Collaborated with colleagues in the agile team and is responsible for testing critical systems. Delivered business values with at-most quality 
•	As a coordinator in the test process, ensured that there is a coordinated test plan and that test cases are carried out and progress is reported
•	Fully involved single-handedly in all phases of the test life cycle (Requirement phase, Planning phase, Analysis phase, Design phase, Implementation phase, Implementation phase, Conclusion phase, Closing phase), defect life cycle
•	Effectively manage Risk & Issues. Provide mitigation & contingency plan
•	Serve as a Subject matter expert in Quality process, Agile, Software Testing Life Cycle, Testing concepts and Tools and handle trainings 
•	Top-notch problem solving, interpersonal communication and project management skills
profile_positions.title: Agile Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Roles and Responsibilities:

•	Developed and implemented test strategies, testcases, test scripts for carrying out software testing and engineering at various stages of SDLC
•	Thorough knowledge of SDLC, test life cycle and Defect life cycle
•	Drawing up a test plan and drawing up test specifications based on User Stories
•	Coordinated effectively with customers, stakeholders, management and operations teams to ensure quality delivery of the product
•	Develop and implement quality mechanism and process for project and account, improving quality standards and enabling management to win new project lines (automation, performance testing, Agile testing and Dev-ops)
•	Coaching / advising team members about testing within the Scrum team.
•	Worked with Dev-Ops model of CI/CD (continuous integration and delivery)
•	Leading the team to define and execute test cases
•	Created and executed test scripts using Selenium automation tool using keyword driven framework
•	Manages risks and problems effectively. Provides mitigation and disaster plan
•	Validate the operation of User Stories within the Sprint and automate where possible the tests that he performs
•	Recruitment of quality control, automation and resource management
•	Performs expert tests


Activities: SCRUM Master, Selenium automation (data and keyword based framework), DB - SQL queries, Web services (REST, Soup UI, Postman), DB-Test Data creation, Test metrics, Test Strategy, Accountable for QA deliverables, Dev-Ops, QA deliverables, Involving and Managing test life cycle, estimations, Risk Management, Coordination with Clients and Stakeholder. System Integration testing, user Acceptance testing, functional testing Regression testing, chain testing, Exploratory testing, Expert testing, Gap Analysis, Test Closure and POC activities. Providing training in agile concepts, Soft skills and QA process activities, QA team establishment.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Analyst and Scrum Master
